name: Pricesbolo e-Services (India)
overview:
PricesBolo.com is the most trusted online distribution network for localized business in India.

The typical Indian consumers are very price and deals driven. With the growing population of internet deals searcher there is a considerable need to bring the most relevant merchant rating and pricing information especially for the localized market. The SMB market typically have very low online visibilty, traditional advertisment channels are expensive and these small & mid-size business lack the sophistacation of advanced technology, search engine optimization, email and sms marketing tools. PricesBolo intends in creating a platform where consumer search and find the best information on local merchants, create a trusted community to share ratings and reviews. PricesBolo also intends to provide local merchants a marketing, sales and distribution platform for their products.

PricesBolo showcase wide product range from various categories like Consumer Electronic goods, Mobiles, Digital cameras, LCD TVs, home appliances and much more. PricesBolo is the great location based search engine for products.

By becoming a member in PricesBolo, users have an access to various tools like price alert, contact seller via SMS, shopping cart, wish list, order history, email alert, SMS alert, coupons and much more. User membership is FREE.

PricesBolo.com was incorporated in Janaury 2009.
